edu.cuny.cat.server
Class ClockController

java.lang.Object
  edu.cuny.cat.server.ClockController
All Implemented Interfaces:
AuctionEventListener
Direct Known Subclasses:
AutoClockController, EventBasedClockController, SynchronousClockController
public abstract class ClockController
extends java.lang.Object
implements AuctionEventListener

A clock control controls the game clock. The game controller hands over the control to a clock control after a game is initialized. It is abstract because it is left to child classes to determine when stop() will is called.

Version:
$Revision: 1.4 $
Author:
Jinzhong Niu
